ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: Application schema, Buildings3D
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines requirements associated with the application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance Class 'Application Schema, Buildings3D'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Buildings3D'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Constraints
TestCase.description: Verify that the features provided in the dataset adhere to the constraints specified in the INSPIRE application schema.

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.a.1: GeometryWhenNoParts
TestAssertion.description:
Check that if a Building does not have any BuildingPart, at least the geometry3DLoD1 or geometry3DLoD2 or geometry3DLoD3 or geometry3DLoD4 attributes is provided, for the Building feature type.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 4 (2): Spatial object types and data types shall comply with the definitions and constraints and include the attributes and association roles set out in the Annexes.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Constraints', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.a.2: Building parts shall be 3D
TestAssertion.description:
Check that the parts of the building is represented using the BuildingPart type of the Buildings3D package (OCL: "inv: self.parts->oclIsKindOf(Buildings3D::BuildingPart)").

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 4 (2): Spatial object types and data types shall comply with the definitions and constraints and include the attributes and association roles set out in the Annexes.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Constraints', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.a.3: MandatoryGeometry
TestAssertion.description:
MandatoryGeometry: Check that at least one of the geometry3DLoD1 or geometry3DLoD2 or geometry3DLoD3 or geometry3DLoD4 attributes is provided, for the BuildingPart feature type.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 4 (2): Spatial object types and data types shall comply with the definitions and constraints and include the attributes and association roles set out in the Annexes.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Constraints', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7
TestAssertion.expression:
let $features_selected := $features[self::bu-core3d:BuildingPart | self::bu-core3d:Building] let $buildingPartIDs := $features[self::bu-core3d:BuildingPart]/@*:id let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected
let $element := if(name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:Building') then let $parts := $feature/bu-base:parts return if (exists($feature/bu-base:parts/@xlink:href) and substring($feature/bu-base:parts/@xlink:href, 2) = $buildingPartIDs) then () else $feature/bu-base:parts/bu-core3d:BuildingPart else $feature return if (((exists($feature/bu-base:parts/bu-core3d:BuildingPart) and name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:Building') or name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:BuildingPart') and count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1) = 0 and count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2) = 0 and count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3) = 0 and count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType': local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'At least one of the geometry3DLoD1 or geometry3DLoD2 or geometry3DLoD3 or geometry3DLoD4 attributes is provided, for the BuildingPart feature type.', 'additionalInfo' : '' }) else if (count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1)}) else if (count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2)}) else if (count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3)}) else if (count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4)}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.a.4: oneGeometryToBeProvided
TestAssertion.description:
Check that either the geometryMultiSurface or the geometrySolid attribute is provided (OCL: "inv: self.geometryMultiSurface->notEmpty() or self.geometrySolid->notEmpty()")

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 4 (2): Spatial object types and data types shall comply with the definitions and constraints and include the attributes and association roles set out in the Annexes.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Constraints', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7
TestAssertion.expression:
let $features_selected := $features[self::bu-core3d:Building | self::bu-core3d:BuildingPart] let $buildingPartIDs := $features[self::bu-core3d:BuildingPart]/@*:id
let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $element := if(name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:Building') then let $parts := $feature/bu-base:parts return if (exists($feature/bu-base:parts/@xlink:href) and substring($feature/bu-base:parts/@xlink:href, 2) = $buildingPartIDs) then () else $feature/bu-base:parts/bu-core3d:BuildingPart else $feature
return if(((exists($feature/bu-base:parts/bu-core3d:BuildingPart) and name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:Building') or name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:BuildingPart') and ((exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometrySolid))) or (exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometrySolid))) or (exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid))) or (exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)) and not(exists($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid)))))then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType': local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'The geometryMultiSurface or the geometrySolid attribute is provided.', 'additionalInfo' : '' }) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometryMultiSurface)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometrySolid) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-base:referenceGeometry', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:geometrySolid)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometrySolid) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-base:referenceGeometry', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:geometrySolid)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-base:referenceGeometry', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD3/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'bu-base:referenceGeometry', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD4/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD/bu-core3d:geometrySolid)}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.a.5: no point referencing in 3D
TestAssertion.description:
Check that the horizontalGeometryReference attribute does not take the value entrancePoint, pointInsideBuilding or pointInsideCadastralParcel, in both BuildingGeometry3DLoD1 and BuildingGeometry3DLoD2 data types (OCL: "inv: self.horizontalGeometryReference->excludesAll(Set{HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue::entrancePoint, HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue::pointInsideBuilding , HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue::pointInsideCadastralParcel})").

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 4 (2): Spatial object types and data types shall comply with the definitions and constraints and include the attributes and association roles set out in the Annexes.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Constraints', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7
TestAssertion.expression:
let $features_selected := $features[self::bu-core3d:Building | self::bu-core3d:BuildingPart] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $invalid_values := ('http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue/entrancePoint', 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue/pointInsideBuilding', 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/HorizontalGeometryReferenceValue/pointInsideCadastralParcel') let $element := if (name($feature) = 'bu-core3d:Building') then let $buildingPart := $feature/bu-base:parts/bu-core3d:BuildingPart return if (exists($buildingPart)) then $buildingPart else $feature else $feature
return if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'horizontalGeometryReference', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference)}) else if(count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference) > 1) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicityBuildings', map {'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType':local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@*:id), 'property': 'horizontalGeometryReference', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference)}) else if($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD2/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference/@xlink:href = $invalid_values) then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType': local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'The horizontalGeometryReference attribute does not take the value entrancePoint, pointInsideBuilding or pointInsideCadastralParcel', 'additionalInfo':''}) else if($element/bu-core3d:geometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:BuildingGeometry3DLoD1/bu-core3d:horizontalGeometryReference/@xlink:href = $invalid_values) then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($element), 'featureType': local-name($element), 'gmlid': string($element/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'The horizontalGeometryReference attribute does not take the value entrancePoint, pointInsideBuilding or pointInsideCadastralParcel', 'additionalInfo':''}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: Buildings3D theme-specific requirements
TestCase.description: Verify that, by way of derogation from article 12(1), the value domain of spatial properties used in the Buildings 3D package is not restricted to simple feature.

TestAssertion.label: bu-3d-as.b.1: Buildings3D theme-specific requirements
TestAssertion.description:
Exclude the Simple features test case of the INSPIRE GML application schemas Conformance class.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Article 12 (1): The value domain of spatial properties defined in this Regulation shall be restricted to the Simple Feature spatial schema as defined in Herring, John R. (ed.), OpenGIS® Implementation Standard for Geographic information – Simple feature access – Part 1: Common architecture, version 1.2.1, Open Geospatial Consortium, 2011, unless specified otherwise for a specific spatial data theme or type.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'Buildings3D theme-specific requirements', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.7
